scripts.prebuild: node --print "'export default \'' + require('./package.json').version + '\';'" > src/version.ts && echo null > src/ark/prelude.json
scripts.build: tsc --build && npm run compile-prelude && cp src/*/prelude.* lib/ursa/
scripts.generate: npm run generate-only && npm run patch-ohm && mkdir -p lib/grammar/ && cp src/grammar/*ohm-bundle.js src/grammar/*ohm-bundle.d.ts lib/grammar/
scripts.update-ohm-patch: cp src/grammar/ursa.ohm-bundle.d.ts src/grammar/ursa.ohm-bundle.d.ts.bak && npm run generate-only && diff -u src/grammar/ursa.ohm-bundle.d.ts src/grammar/ursa.ohm-bundle.d.ts.bak > src/grammar/ursa.ohm-bundle.d.ts.diff; npm run patch-ohm
scripts.test: npm run generate && npm run build && ava
scripts.postpublish: git push --tags --no-verify && gh release create $(git describe) -t "Release $(git describe)"
scripts.no-diff-or-untracked: git diff --exit-code && git ls-files --other --directory --exclude-standard | sed q1
